about_the_game:
In Fallen Crown, you take on the role of a young prince from an exiled royal dynasty, forced out of power by treacherous schemes. After the ruthless murder of the king, a usurper took the throne, banishing the royal family to distant, wild lands. Your mission is to rebuild the dynasty, establish prosperous cities across multiple regions, and prepare to overthrow the usurper through economic means.

The game combines classic survival strategy elements with a unique dynasty mechanic. The prince can find a bride, start a family, and grow the royal lineage. Each member of the royal family has unique traits that will influence the laws they can pass when they ascend to the throne.

Fallen Crown offers players:

Building

Develop and expand your settlements by constructing essential structures to ensure the growth and prosperity of your cities.

Survival

Carefully manage resources to ensure the survival of your family and subjects in a harsh, unforgiving world.

Dynasty

Court a partner, exchange gifts, and host grand dynastic weddings. Build up your royal family, form alliances, and groom future leaders, each with unique traits.

Family

The ruler’s citadel serves as a central hub where you can add new rooms based on the ruler’s character traits. These rooms enhance the functionality of existing buildings and passively influence both the morale of your citizens and the settlement as a whole. For example, a cruel ruler might add a torture chamber, affecting the overall atmosphere of the kingdom.

Genome

Citizens form families and pass on their traits to their children, creating a dynamic system where future generations inherit a unique set of characteristics.

Economic

Establish and manage trade routes, develop industries, and strategically allocate resources to build a strong economy capable of challenging the usurper. Strengthen your kingdom’s economic foundation to gain an advantage in the final confrontation.

Social

Win the favor of your people and neighboring lords by making wise decisions, forming alliances, and meeting their needs. Build strong social ties and prepare for the eventual overthrow of the usurper, uniting the kingdom under your rightful rule.

Romance

Meet and court potential partners from neighboring lands, exchange letters, give gifts, host feasts, and arrange grand dynastic weddings.

Dynamic World

Influence the surrounding world, develop relationships with other lords, and adapt to changing conditions.

Take on the challenge and restore your kingdom in Fallen Crown, a strategy game where every decision you make shapes the future of your dynasty and the fate of the throne.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX-460 (4 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A380 (6 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7600 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 580 (8 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: You will lead an exiled royal dynasty, building prosperous cities, gaining the trust of the people, and preparing to overthrow the usurper. In the unique dynasty mode, the leader can find a partner and have children to shape the future of the kingdom.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
